aqsa.name: Tashkeen
aqsa.title: A Love Letter on Your 24th Birthday
content: As you turn 24 today, I find myself overwhelmed with gratitude for every moment we've shared. You are not just my partner, but my best friend, my confidant, and the person who makes every day worth living.
I love the way you see the world - with such wonder and curiosity. I love how you make everyone around you feel special.
Here's to you, to us, and to all the beautiful years ahead. Happy 24th birthday, my love.
